means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 吉本 Gibb的昵称
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 吉本来源于日耳曼语人名，含义是“礼物+朋友”(git+friend)

sentence.Network_en: Gibbon, however, is of opinion that theirs was a valid marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是, 据吉本看来,这二人的婚姻是经过正当手续的.

sentence.Network_en: I was still the slave of education and prejudice ( Edward Gibbon )
sentence.Network_cn: 我受教育和偏见的影响还是很深 ( 爱德华吉本 )

sentence.Network_en: Churches and altars were polluted by atrocious murders ( Edward Gibbon )
sentence.Network_cn: 教堂和圣坛被凶残的谋杀亵渎了 ( 爱德华吉本 )

list.abs: 非洲大草原血腥战记第二部 /... ... 长臂猿属    228 银白长臂猿 Silvery gibbon 长臂猿属    229 灰长臂猿 Gray gibbon.
2005年1月5日 -  海南长臂猿(Hainan Gibbon)是世界上的四大类人猿之一,是与人类最“亲近”的灵长类动物,只生活在海南岛的热带雨林之中。根据建国初期科学工作者的实地.

...鲁斯罗（Anshel Bruslow）及合唱指挥家亨利吉本斯（Henry Gibbons）教授。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French, from an Indian dialect word

entry.def: A gibbon is an ape with very long arms and no tail that lives in southern Asia.

means.word_mean: 1. smallest and most perfectly anthropoid arboreal ape having long arms and no tail; of southern Asia and East Indies

auth_sentence.content: It is rare to see a completely white gibbon.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is rare to see a completely white gibbon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is rare to see a completely white gibbon.

auth_sentence.content: If a gibbon's mate is killed, it may never pair up again.
auth_sentence.res_content: If a gibbon's mate is killed, it may never pair up again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If a gibbon's mate is killed, it may never pair up again.

auth_sentence.content: He kept Gibbon and Prescott on the lamp stand next to his resting chair.
